text: Maimuna is a genus of funnel weavers first described by Pekka T. Lehtinen in 1967. ==Species== it contains seven species: *Maimuna bovierlapierrei (Kulczyński, 1911) — Lebanon, Israel *Maimuna cariae Brignoli, 1978 — Turkey *Maimuna carmelica Levy, 1996 — Israel *Maimuna cretica (Kulczyński, 1903) — Greece, Crete *Maimuna inornata (O. Pickard-Cambridge, 1872) — Greece, Syria, Israel *Maimuna meronis Levy, 1996 — Israel *Maimuna vestita (C. L. Koch, 1841) — Eastern Mediterranean ==References== Category:Agelenidae Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Taxa named by Pekka T. Lehtinen
title: Maimuna (spider)
